title: This "us vs. them" mentality has gotten so, so far out of hand
body:
That I don't think there's any hope of fixing it, now. Hell, you can't even say you prefer Coke over Pepsi without people getting hostile over it. People are "swatted" because they said they like Xbox over PlayStation on a YouTube video or stream.

This is **insanity**! And it only gets worse the more political you get. "You damn liberals always do blah blah blah" or "You dumb conservatives are always yadda yadda yadda" and shit like that. It's seriously stupid. Really really stupid. I don't even know what can be done to fix this problem.

Just, stop contributing to it, is what I'm getting at, here.
